multi.markdownDescription: String field to index with the name of the alternate analyzer specified in the `multi` object. To learn more about configuring a `multi` object, see [Multi Analyzer](https://dochub.mongodb.org/core/multi-fts) and follow [an example](https://dochub.mongodb.org/core/string-example-fts).
multi.description: String field to index with the name of an alternate analyzer specified in the multi object.
